Note: Formerly 873.5; Latin lines before and after first line.
Subjects: sermons, verse in; Christ, uniqueness of
_description: Christ’s singularity — three lines in a Latin sermon in die natali

CULIi38.Transcription:
Eneles manschepe þat rotyth notFrendschupe þat faylllith
                    notHe is lordschuppe þat deyth nowthe
